programmes.show_description: Girl Power! Boyband pin-ups, Britpop & High School Heroes! We're spending a whole week with the Smash Hits & Guilty Pleasures of the 1990s!
The One & Only year - bookended by The KLF, and featuring Cher, The Prodigy, Simply Red & Vic Reeves! Jenny Powell takes a Joyride through the pages of yet another NOW Yearbook.
Girl Power! Boyband pin-ups, Britpop & High School Heroes! We're spending a whole week with the Smash Hits & Guilty Pleasures of the 1990s!
Amazingly some of your favourite 90s hits weren't originals - they were sung years earlier by someone else! Surprises galore from Take That, Vic Reeves, Steps, Pet Shop Boys & more
The decade where we did the Bartman, took a Trip to Trumpton & had Sex on the Beach! The 90s were full of nonsense & Pat Sharp was the silliest of them all!
Girl Power! Boyband pin-ups, Britpop & High School Heroes! We're spending a whole week with the Smash Hits & Guilty Pleasures of the 1990s!
From Britney to Madonna and Robbie to Elton, these are the 50 biggest videos from the artists that ruled the 1990s. Every video a full on smash hit!
Girl Power! Boyband pin-ups, Britpop & High School Heroes! We're spending a whole week with the Smash Hits & Guilty Pleasures of the 1990s!
From Beats International in 1990 to the Wamdue Project in 1999 - Kiss FM legend Bam Bam presents 65 big party number 1s of the 1990s! Back to back & in order.
Girl Power! Boyband pin-ups, Britpop & High School Heroes! We're spending a whole week with the Smash Hits & Guilty Pleasures of the 1990s!
Before Facebook, Twitter and Instagram were a thing, the school disco was the only social hangout that mattered! Let's party like it's the 90s just one more time.
Dive into the neon-lit 90s clubs filled with Infectious beats and dance classics not to be missed. From high-energy Eurodance to pulsating house anthems, come throw some shapes!
Girl Power! Boyband pin-ups, Britpop & High School Heroes! We're spending a whole week with the Smash Hits & Guilty Pleasures of the 1990s!
Non-stop 90s guitar rock, Brit Pop & power ballads! From Bon Jovi & Blur to Def Leppard, Queen & REM.
Bruno Brookes with the biggest UK rock tracks of the 90s. Expect a decent slice of Stereophonics, Bon Jovi, Nirvana & RHCP. But you might be surprised at the No.1!
Non-stop 90s guitar rock, Brit Pop & power ballads! From Bon Jovi & Blur to Def Leppard, Queen & REM.
These rebellious teens rocked every college campus throughout the 90s. Expect monster anthems from Kiss, Green Day, Smash Mouth, The Crash Test Dummies & many more!
Girl Power! Boyband pin-ups, Britpop & High School Heroes! We're spending a whole week with the Smash Hits & Guilty Pleasures of the 1990s!

programmes.show_name: As Seen On TV with Robin Banks
programmes.show_description: Robin Banks' chart with big TV connections - could be theme tunes, Comic Relief, adverts or just a song made famous by a TV show. Our top 25 chart is Absolutely Fabulous!
Girl Power! Boyband pin-ups, Britpop & High School Heroes! We're spending a whole week with the Smash Hits & Guilty Pleasures of the 1990s!
In order - Mark Goodier's 12 hour journey through the decade's biggest number 1 songs, from Vanilla Ice & Chesney Hawkes to Boyzone, Backstreet Boys & B*Witched.
